## Focused Work

### Optilibria â€“ Universal Optimization Framework

- 31+ algorithms (gradient, evolutionary, hybrid)
- FFT-Laplace preconditioning, GPU acceleration, extensive benchmarking
- Stack: Python, NumPy/SciPy, CUDA

### ATLAS â€“ Autonomous Research System

- Multi-agent protocol with self-refutation and literature synthesis
- Integrates LangChain, vector databases, policy enforcement layers

### MeatheadPhysicist â€“ Physics Education Platform

- Quantum mechanics simulations, interactive notebooks, accessible storytelling
- Python + Jupyter + Three.js visual stack

### REPZCoach â€“ Enterprise Coaching Platform

- AI-assisted workout design, payments, analytics dashboard, Stripe/Supabase
- React + TypeScript + Tailwind + Supabase edge functions

```
â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—

â•‘  31+ ALGORITHMS | GPU ACCELERATION | FFT-LAPLACE       â•‘

- **Algorithms:** 31+ gradient, evolutionary, and hybrid optimization methods
- **Performance:** FFT-Laplace preconditioning with GPU acceleration
- **Benchmarking:** Extensive test suites and performance analytics
- **Stack:** Python, NumPy/SciPy, CUDA, PyTorch

### ATLAS â€“ Autonomous Research System

```
â•”â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•—

<details>
<summary><b>âŸ¨ HIDDEN.SECTOR() âŸ©</b></summary>

<details>
<summary><b>Repository Governance</b></summary>

<br>

**Workflow & Standards:**
- Documentation: `docs/governance/workflow.md`
- Continuous Integration: `.github/workflows/ci.yml`
- Core Documentation: `README.md`, `CONTRIBUTING.md`, `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`, `CHANGELOG.md`, `LICENSE`

**Branching Strategy:**
- `main` â€“ Protected production branch
- `feat/*` â€“ Feature development
- `fix/*` â€“ Bug fixes
- `hotfix/*` â€“ Critical production fixes
- `release/*` â€“ Release preparation

**Security:**
- No secrets in commits
- Environment variables only
- Regular dependency audits
- Automated security scanning

</details>
